sourcesContent:
import Axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; function RegisterForm() { const [registerList, setRegisterList] = useState([]); const getRegister = () => { Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/registers").then((response) => { setRegisterList(response.data); }); }; return (

CP University

Sign Up



{registerList.map((val, key) => { return (

First Name: {val.firstname}

Last Name: {val.lastname}

Email: {val.email}

Password: {val.password}

Confirm Password: {val.confirmpassword}

); })}
); } export default RegisterForm;
